files.patch:
@@ -1,10 +0,0 @@
-Apache Syncope is an effort undergoing incubation at the Apache Software
-Foundation (ASF), sponsored by the Apache Incubator PMC. 
-
-Incubation is required of all newly accepted projects until a further review 
-indicates that the infrastructure, communications, and decision making process 
-have stabilized in a manner consistent with other successful ASF projects. 
-
-While incubation status is not necessarily a reflection of the completeness 
-or stability of the code, it does indicate that the project has yet to be 
-fully endorsed by the ASF.

@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@ under the License. Apache Syncope - Apache Syncope Documentation Team + Apache Syncope Documentation Team @@ -48,23 +48,5 @@ under the License. Who has access to What, When, How, and Why?

- -
-
-

Apache Syncope is an effort undergoing - incubation - at - The Apache Software Foundation (ASF), sponsored by the Apache Incubator PMC. Incubation is required of all newly - accepted projects until a further review indicates that the infrastructure, communications, and decision making - process have stabilized in a manner consistent with other successful ASF projects. - While incubation status is not necessarily a reflection of the completeness or stability of the code, - it does indicate that the project has yet to be fully endorsed by the ASF. -

-

You can view our current - incubation status - for more details. -

-
-
- \ No newline at end of file +

@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@ under the License. Release Process - Apache Syncope Documentation Team + Apache Syncope Documentation Team @@ -119,10 +119,10 @@ under the License. from JIRA.
  • - Update the - downloads site page by adding the new release artifacts with base - URL http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/incubator/syncope/<version>/ - and by moving current release artifacts to 'Older Releases' section, also changing base URL to http://archive.apache.org/dist/incubator/syncope/ + Update the downloads site page by adding the new release artifacts with base + URL http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/syncope/<version>/ + and by moving current release artifacts to 'Older Releases' section, also changing base URL to + http://archive.apache.org/dist/syncope/
  • Commit any changes back to svn: @@ -153,7 +153,7 @@ under the License.
  • Checkout a clean copy of the trunk/branch to release using command line svn: - svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk/ release + svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/trunk/ release
    • @@ -236,8 +236,8 @@ cd <version>
    1. This step will create the staging site - svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/site/ site -svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/tags/syncope-<version> syncope-<version> + svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/site/ site +svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/tags/syncope-<version> syncope-<version> cd syncope-<version> mvn clean install mvn -P site -Dsite.deploymentBaseUrl=file:///<absolute path to ../site/<version>> @@ -313,17 +313,17 @@ svn commit -m "staging site for release"
    2. Create a VOTE email thread on - syncope-dev to record votes as replies, e.g.: - 
      To: syncope-dev@incubator.apache.org
+            syncope-dev to record votes as replies, e.g.:
+            
      To: dev@syncope.apache.org
 Subject: [VOTE] Apache Syncope <version>
 
 I've created a <version> release, with the following artifacts up for a vote:
 
 SVN source tag (r9999999):
-https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/tags/<version>/
+https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/tags/<version>/
 
 List of changes:
-https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/tags/<version>/CHANGES
+https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/syncope/tags/<version>/CHANGES
 
 Maven staging repo:
 https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/orgapachesyncope-YYY/
@@ -332,10 +332,10 @@ Source release (checksums and signatures are available at the same location):
 https://repository.apache.org/content/repositories/orgapachesyncope-YYY/org/apache/syncope/syncope/<version>/syncope-<version>-source-release.zip
 
 Staging site:
-http://incubator.apache.org/syncope/<version>/
+http://syncope.apache.org/<version>/
 
 PGP release keys (signed using ABCDEFG):
-http://www.apache.org/dist/incubator/syncope/KEYS
+http://www.apache.org/dist/syncope/KEYS
 
 Vote will be open for 72 hours.
 
@@ -344,9 +344,9 @@ Vote will be open for 72 hours.
 [ ] -1  disapprove (and reason why)
    3. - Create a DISCUSS email thread on syncope-dev for any vote questions, e.g.: + Create a DISCUSS email thread on syncope-dev for any vote questions, e.g.: 
      -To: syncope-dev@incubator.apache.org
+To: dev@syncope.apache.org
 Subject: [DISCUSS] Apache Syncope <version>
 
 Discussion thread for vote on <version> release, with SVN source tag (r9999999).
@@ -358,7 +358,7 @@ Some of the things to check before voting are:
  - can you build the contents of source release zip and SVN tag
  - do all of the staged jars/wars/zips contain the required LICENSE and NOTICE files
  - are all of the staged jars/wars/zips signed and the signature verifiable
- - is the signing key in the project's KEYS file and on a public server (i.e. http://www.apache.org/dist/incubator/syncope/)
+ - is the signing key in the project's KEYS file and on a public server (i.e. http://www.apache.org/dist/syncope/)
    4. @@ -369,94 +369,16 @@ Some of the things to check before voting are: however it is usually a good idea to rollback the release if a -1 vote is received (see "Recovering from a vetoed release").
      5. -
    5. After the vote has been open for at least 72 hours, has at least three +1 PMC votes and no -1 votes, then post the results to the vote thread: - 
      To: syncope-dev@incubator.apache.org
+            
      To: dev@syncope.apache.org
 Subject: [RESULT] [VOTE] Apache Syncope <version>
 
 Hi all,
 after 72 hours, the vote for Syncope <version> [1] *passes*
-with ... PPMC + ... non-PPMC votes.
+with ... PMC + ... non-PMC votes.
 
-+1 (PPMC / binding)
-* ...
-
-+1 (non binding)
- * ... (or <none>)
-
-0
- * ... (or <none>)
-
--1
- * ... (or <none>)
-
-Thanks to everyone participating.
-
-I will now submit the release for voting on the general@incubator.apache.org
-
-Best regards.
-
-[1] <link to syncope-dev ML archives for the related [VOTE] thread>
      
-
      6. -
    6. Once the vote has been approved on syncope-dev, - then the release process should be performed again on - general@incubator ML. - 
      To: general@incubator.apache.org
-Subject: [VOTE] Apache Syncope <version>
-            
-I've created a <version> release, with the following artifacts up for a vote:
-
-SVN source tag (r9999999):
-https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/tags/<version>/
